hero_subtitle: Design stunning wedding and birthday invitations with our easy-to-use templates. Customize text, export as JPG or PDF, and share your perfect invitations in minutes.
everything_you_need: Everything you need to create professional invitation cards without the complexity of traditional design tools.
easy_text_editing_desc: Click and edit text directly on your invitation cards. No complex tools or learning curve required.
professional_templates_desc: Choose from beautifully designed wedding and birthday templates created by professional designers.
multiple_export_options_desc: Export your invitations as high-quality PNG images or PDF files ready for printing or sharing.
mobile_friendly_desc: Create and edit invitations on any device. Our responsive design works perfectly on mobile and desktop.
lightning_fast_desc: Create stunning invitations in minutes, not hours. Our streamlined process gets you results quickly.
easy_sharing_desc: Share your invitations digitally or print them at home. Perfect for both online and offline distribution.
templates_ready_desc: Browse our collection of professionally designed invitation templates. Each template is fully customizable to match your event's style.
ready_to_create: Ready to Create Your Perfect Invitation?
join_thousands: Join thousands of users who have created beautiful invitations with InviteEasy. Start designing your perfect invitation card today – it's completely free!
no_templates_available: No templates available at the moment.
about_quote: We make designing personalized invitations easy and simple, letting you focus on what matters most—your celebration.
about_thank_you: Thank you for choosing InviteEasy. We're excited to be a part of your special moments and help you create beautiful, memorable invitations—effortlessly.
about_belief: At InviteEasy, we believe everyone should be able to design stunning invitations without any design skills. Our user-friendly platform lets you create, customize, and share invitations for weddings, birthdays, baby showers, and more—all in just a few clicks.
about_our_story_text: Founded in 2024, InviteEasy was born from a passion for design and a love for celebrating life's milestones. What started as a small project for friends and family quickly grew into a full-featured app dedicated to making invitation creation simple, fast, and fun for everyone.
about_what_we_offer_text: A curated collection of professionally designed templates, an intuitive editor, instant export options, and a commitment to privacy and ease of use.
about_care: We put a lot of care and creativity into InviteEasy, so you can focus on celebrating your moments.
privacy_intro: At InviteEasy, your privacy is our priority. We are committed to protecting your data and being transparent about how we use it.
privacy_account_info_desc: Email address, password (encrypted), and profile details you provide when signing up or contacting us.
privacy_invitation_content_desc: All text, images, and design elements you add to your invitations are stored securely so you can edit, save, or export them later.
privacy_uploaded_images_desc: Any images or media files you upload (e.g., personal photos, logos) are stored securely using trusted cloud services.
privacy_device_usage_desc: We collect anonymized data such as page views, browser/device type, session duration, and click activity to improve our platform. We may use analytics tools like Google Analytics.
privacy_editing_saving: Enable invitation editing, saving, and exporting (PDF/PNG/MP4)
privacy_personalize: Personalize your experience and remember your settings (e.g., language, recent projects)
privacy_improve_site: Improve site performance, detect bugs, and analyze user behavior
privacy_support_emails: Send support emails or service updates (only if necessary)
privacy_safety: Ensure platform safety, prevent abuse, and maintain integrity
privacy_service_providers_desc: We work with trusted third-party providers (like AWS, Cloudinary, and analytics services) to store images, monitor performance, and deliver features. These providers only access data necessary for their functions and are under confidentiality agreements.
privacy_legal_compliance_desc: We may disclose your information when required to do so by law, regulation, or court order.
privacy_business_transfers_desc: If our business is acquired or merged, user data may be transferred as part of that transaction, following applicable privacy regulations.
privacy_no_sell: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.
privacy_encrypted: All data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS) and stored securely with reputable cloud platforms
privacy_access_controls: Access controls and monitoring to prevent unauthorized use
privacy_rights_access: Access or request deletion of your personal data
privacy_rights_contact: Contact us regarding any privacy-related concerns
privacy_rights_request: To make a request, email us at
privacy_children: InviteEasy is designed for all age groups, but we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without verified parental consent. If we learn such data has been collected, it will be deleted promptly.
privacy_updates: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time to reflect changes in technology, law, or our services. Updates will be posted on this page with a new Effective Date.
privacy_contact: If you have any questions, suggestions, or data-related requests, you can contact our support team:
